content.rendered: JohannesburgFest is a festival of street art and electro-jazz music. Each year the festival starts with the same ritual. Graffiti artists repaint the insides of an abandoned public pool, where the concerts take place. In 2019 graffiti artists used exclusively one color of spray paint — pink.
